badge_template.description: Earners of the Azure Fundamentals certification have demonstrated foundational level knowledge of cloud services and how those services are provided with Microsoft Azure.
badge_template.name: Microsoft Certified: Azure Fundamentals

badge_template_activities.title: Pass Exam AZ-900: Microsoft Azure Fundamentals

badge_template.description: Earning Azure Administrator Associate certification validates the skills and knowledge to implement, manage, and monitor an organizationâ€™s Microsoft Azure environment. Candidates have a deep understanding of each implementing, managing, and monitoring identity, governance, storage, compute, and virtual networks in a cloud environment, plus provision, size, monitor, and adjust resources, when needed.
badge_template.name: Microsoft Certified: Azure Administrator Associate

badge_template_activities.title: PASS EXAM AZ-104:
- Exam AZ-104: Microsoft Azure Administrator
OR PASS EXAM AZ-103*:
- Exam AZ-103: Microsoft Azure Administrator (*Exam now retired)
OR PASS EXAM 533* AND EXAM AZ-102*:
- Exam 533: Implementing Microsoft Azure Infrastructure Solutions (*Exam now retired)
- Exam AZ-102: Microsoft Azure Administrator Certification Transition (*Exam now retired)

endorsements.description: This credential has been successfully evaluated by the American Council on Education for college credit. It is recommended for a total of 2 college credits. For more information about ACE CREDIT evaluations, visit www.acenet.edu.

badge_template.description: Earning the Azure Solutions Architect Expert certification demonstrates subject matter expertise in designing cloud and hybrid solutions that run on Microsoft Azure, including compute, network, storage, monitoring, and security. Candidates have advanced experience and knowledge across IT operations, including networking, virtualization, identity, security, business continuity, disaster recovery, data platforms, and governance.
badge_template.name: Microsoft Certified: Azure Solutions Architect Expert

badge_template_activities.title: PASS EXAM AZ-305 AND ONE OF THE FOLLOWING EXAMS: AZ-103* OR AZ-100* OR AZ-104 OR AZ-303*
OR PASS EXAM 70-533* AND AZ-102* AND AZ-305
- Exam 533: Implementing Microsoft Azure Infrastructure Solutions (*Exam now retired.)
- Exam AZ-100: Microsoft Azure Infrastructure and Deployment (*Exam now retired.)
- Exam AZ-102: Microsoft Azure Administrator Certification Transition
- Exam AZ-103: Microsoft Azure Administrator (*Exam now retired.)
- Exam AZ-104: Microsoft Azure Administrator
- Exam AZ-303: Microsoft Azure Architect Technologies (*Exam now retired.)
- Exam AZ-305: Designing Microsoft Azure Infrastructure Solutions
PASS EITHER EXAM AZ-300* OR EXAM AZ-303* AND EXAM AZ-301* OR EXAM AZ-304*:
OR PASS EXAM AZ-302* AND EXAM AZ-303* OR EXAM AZ-304* OR EXAM 535:
- Exam AZ-300: Microsoft Azure Architect Technologies (*Exam now retired.)
- Exam AZ-301: Microsoft Azure Architect Design (*Exam now retired.)
- Exam AZ-303: Microsoft Azure Architect Technologies (*Exam now retired.)
- Exam AZ-304: Microsoft Azure Architect Design (*Exam now retired.)
- Exam 535: Architecting Microsoft Azure Solutions (*Exam now retired.)

badge_template.description: Passing Exam 480: Programming in HTML5 with JavaScript and CSS3 validates a candidateâ€™s ability to access and secure data as well as implement document structures, objects, and program flow.
badge_template.name: Exam 480: Programming in HTML5 with JavaScript and CSS3

badge_template_activities.title: VALIDATE SKILLS IN THE FOLLOWING AREAS:
- Implement and manipulate document structures and objects
- Implement program flow
- Access and secure data
- Use CSS3 in applications

badge_template.description: Passing Exam AZ-303: Microsoft Azure Architect Technologies validates the skills and knowledge to advise stakeholders and translate business requirements into secure, scalable, and reliable cloud solutions. Candidates have advanced experience and knowledge across IT operations, including networking, virtualization, identity, security, business continuity, disaster recovery, data platform, budgeting, and governance. *This exam is now retired.
badge_template.name: AZ-303: Microsoft Azure Architect Technologies

badge_template_activities.title: VALIDATE SKILLS IN THE FOLLOWING AREAS:
- Implement and Monitor an Azure Infrastructure
- Implement Management and Security Solutions
- Implement Solutions for Apps
- Implement and Manage Data Platforms

badge_template.description: Passing Exam AZ-304: Microsoft Azure Architect Design validates the skills and knowledge to advise stakeholders and translate business requirements into secure, scalable, and reliable cloud solutions. Candidates have advanced experience and knowledge across IT operations, including networking, virtualization, identity, security, business continuity, disaster recovery, data platform, budgeting, and governance. *This exam is now retired.
badge_template.name: AZ-304: Microsoft Azure Architect Design

badge_template_activities.title: VALIDATE SKILLS IN THE FOLLOWING AREAS:
- Design monitoring
- Design identity and security
- Design data storage
- Design business continuity
- Design infrastructure

badge_template.description: Passing Exam 483: Programming in C# validates a candidateâ€™s ability to manage program flow, create and use types, debug applications and implement security as well as implement data access.
badge_template.name: Exam 483: Programming in C#

badge_template_activities.title: VALIDATE SKILLS IN THE FOLLOWING AREAS:
- Manage program flow
- Create and use types
- Debug applications and implement security
- Implement data access

badge_template.description: An Oracle PL/SQL Developer Certified Associate has demonstrated expertise in building database-centric Internet applications for Oracle Database 10g, 11g and 12c.
badge_template.name: Oracle PL/SQL Developer Certified Associate

badge_template_activities.title: Pass the Oracle Database 12c: SQL Fundamentals, Oracle Database 11g: SQL Fundamentals I exam, or Oracle Database SQL Expert exam
Pass the Oracle Database 11g: Program with PL/SQL exam or the Program with PL/SQL exam

badge_template.description: An Oracle Database SQL Certified Expert has demonstrated the complete set of skills required to work with the powerful SQL programming language and has mastered the key concepts of a relational database. Candidates who hold this certification retain access to the eCertificate, logo and badge. They can provide certification verification to a third party through certview.oracle.com.
badge_template.name: Oracle Database SQL Certified Expert

badge_template_activities.title: Pass the Oracle Database SQL Expert exam

badge_template.description: Oracle Advanced PL/SQL Developer Certified Professionals demonstrate expertise in with database-centric Internet applications for Oracle Database 10g, 11g and 12c. This certification is retired. Candidates who hold this certification retain access to the eCertificate, logo and digital badge. They can also provide verification through certview.oracle.com.
badge_template.name: Oracle Advanced PL/SQL Developer Certified Professional

badge_template_activities.title: Earn the Oracle PL/SQL Developer Certified Associate certification
Pass the Oracle Database 11g: Advanced PL/SQL exam
